plugin.name: distributed-lock
plugin.author: Jordon Saardchit
plugin.title: Distributed Lock Plugin
plugin.description: This plugin provides a framework and interface for a synchronization mechanism distributed to multiple server instances. In today's world of horizontal computational scale and massive concurrency, it becomes increasingly difficult to synchronize operations outside the context of a single computational space (server/process). This plugin aims to make that easier by providing a simple service to facilitate this, as well as defining an interface for adding low level providers.
